concept.title: DITA to legacypdf (Deprecated)
concept.shortdesc: The first few versions of the toolkit came with a demo PDF build, which was eventually replaced by the much more robust PDF Plug-in (also known as PDF2). This code is no longer maintained by the DITA-OT developers.

conbody.p: The demo PDF transform was deprecated in DITA-OT release 1.4.3, when it was replaced by the PDF Plug-in. The older script is still included in order to support older customizations or build scripts that extended the code; however, the transform type must be set to "legacypdf".
